Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking past the Hofton Ziggurat on the south side of Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: The Hofton Ziggurat has an octagonal base, which rises up in a pyramid shape approximately fifty meters up. The fancy architecture is based on the ancient Allakaren Pyramid, but is not quite as impressive as the latter. Although replicated, no one has ever really captured the style of the ancient pyramids.
